title: Language Learning Design Integrating Scientific Practices for Real-World Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Microlearning structure designed for mobile environments using digital devices. Integrates scientific problem-solving approaches into language learning to strengthen real-life application abilities

learning_goals: Learners can scientifically analyze and propose solutions for language problems occurring in everyday situations through problem-based learning
Learners can represent complex linguistic phenomena as simplified models and explain them logically using modeling techniques
Learners can verify and improve the validity of language models through argumentation and inquiry with peers during formative assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
